ygData.subject: Re: Bard Express Mail Spoiler
ygData.msgSnippet: There is also a Bard npc in Innothule named something darksinger... I was playing my ogre shaman but couldnt get close enough to talk to him with out killing
ygData.messageBody:
There is also a Bard npc in Innothule named something darksinger... I was playing my ogre shaman but couldnt get close enough to talk to him with out killing me
Talonstar, Wandering minsteral of E'ci
Shadowmoon, Assassin
Boss, ogre Shaman
----- Original Message -----
From: TommyC
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Sent: Monday, July 05, 1999 11:12 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Bard Express Mail Spoiler
